name: Detective Mystery Night
description:
The gamejam entry "Detective Mystery Night"  is a point and click adventure and was an attempt to create an immersive detective game where players solve a crime and find clues. 

The team designed an intricate storyline, added interactive elements, and created interesting characters. Players had to use their observational skills and deductive reasoning to gather clues and eliminate suspects. However, the time constraints of the gamejam were challenging. The team encountered problems and had to cut features like multiple endings and complex puzzles. 

Despite not meeting their vision for the game, the team was happy of their efforts and grateful for the experience. They submitted their entry with high hopes, but it didn't make the cut. . ""Detective Mystery Night" was an honest attempt that taught the team valuable lessons in game development and teamwork.

Click to interact. There is no exit in game so use Alt+F4.

Alexandre Rodier, Alycia Paré Michaud, Samuel Drapeau, Maxim Morin, Steven Hamel, Loĩc Bouchard,  Jordan Massé, Tristan St-Laurent, Antoine Flynn
